headline: CDIL Digital Scholarship Fellowships
paragraph: Paid fellowship opportunities are available for faculty and students at the Center for Digital Inquiry & Learning! Apply by March 15th.

headline: Think Open Fellowship applications are open!
paragraph: Applications for 2019 Think Open Fellowships are now open. Apply by March 29th for this great opportunity to make an impact on education affordability!

headline: Idaho Aerial Imagery Explorer
paragraph: A new interface to discover, explore, and download digital georeferenced aerial imagery for Idaho.

headline: Library Workshops!
paragraph: The library hosts workshops every week. Join us to learn about tools that impact your research or kick start your projects!

headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Ph.D. Student Ross Miller (Physics '22) is one of the Library's ThinkOpen Fellows using Open Educational Resources (OER) to help save students money.

headline: Jazz Fest Exhibit: Here's to the Band
paragraph: An exhibit highlighting Lionel Hampton and his band will be on display January 14th through March 11th in honor of the Lionel Hampton Jazz Festival.
